experiences.title: General Motors
text_list: Currently working in Active Safety in order to improve testing and simulation of controllers.
Developed an internal tool for automating test configurations using Python.
Developed high fidelity simulation models for hardware-in-the-loop vehicle testing.

experiences.title: Magna International
text_list: Refactored a real-time application to be compatible with a hard RTOS, allowing the software to be executable on an embedded platform.
Optimized execution time of a real-time application by splitting computation onto two separate cores, reducing runtime from 80ms to 30ms.
Developed an internal application using C++ and openCV to read and analyze sensor information.

experiences.title: S2E Technologies
text_list: Spearheaded a project to design an autonomous delivery robot used within communities by building a prototype presented to stakeholders.
Utilized SLAM, obstacle detection, and path finding algorithms using ROS libraries and a LiDAR sensor to implement autonomous navigation.
